content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 459.8 - Validation process under group eligibility requirements

State Regulations
(a) Validation
period. A validation must be done annually, at such time as determined by the
department. (b) A one-percent
sample of the total universe of participants in the statewide program is
required. (c) A random sample of
all centers in the State receiving funds for services from the local districts
will be selected by the department to be used in the validation
process. (d) The senior citizen
centers shall be notified that a validation process will be done during one day
of one week to reach the one-percent sample. One hundred percent of the
participants in each center selected must be validated on that day. (e) The specific validation procedures set
forth in section
459.9
of this Part will be
performed by the local social services district involved, under the supervision
and coordination of the department. Notes
